article_text:
None

ANI Fishing Derby Will Mounts (left) brought his grandsons Harley Grogan (center) and Tommy Grogan to fish in the Red River All-American Fishing Derby held Saturday, June 6, 2015 at the John H. Overton Lock & Dam in Poland. "They saw an ad," said Mounts and the boys wanted to go. "I'm trying to see how they enjoy fishing." The derby celebrated National Fishing and Boating week and the Louisiana free fishing weekend.-Melinda Martinez/The Town Talk Melinda Martinez/mmartinez@thetowntalk.com
